text: @realDonaldTrump Sir who are you listing to about Israel? We’ll give you this advise again! Leave Israel alone about their land and Jerusalem! Please do not make them give up any land or you think covid-19 is something? You anti seen what can come if you move their Borders or give up Jerusalem
